text: Had a lot of fun, it really strips rp down to the fundamentals, makes it really easy to get a game up and running in no time
We risked our lives for a magistrates goat

I was telling Michael the only thing I'd like them to improve that I saw of it so far is the classes could use a little more differentiation. Really everything you do is tied to your skill points and every class can effectively be as good as any other class. All weapons use the same hit die so there's no advantage to a dagger vs a spear or whatever
Seems like everyone might as well carry a bow and be an archer because there's no penalty to engaging at range for anyone
Initially at least everyone is as good at every other role as the next person
ordered a bunch of dungeon parts from that justin link
<@U02F8LF2X> 3d crafting youtube channel i was talking about <https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2Rlv-ug-mtnXuMwlpcqFgg>

attachments.title: Black Magic Craft
attachments.text: Easy ass projects for tabletop gaming. We focus on terrain and dungeon tiles that have all the bad ass look and feel of 3D but with the playability of 2.5d. ...
